topics.body:
I just notice than I always have a group of "main" friends that consists of 4 people including myself.

Myself.
The smart guy.
The black guy.
The somewhat different guy.

It's kinda weird and I have like 3 groups of these already.

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54fab1756368726c54521900#post_54fab1756368726c54521900
It was a pedometer that was given in HeartGold and SoulSilver. You would transfer a pokemon on to it walk around with said pokemon to gain XP. However you could also catch Pokemon and get items with it. It was a super cool gimmick.

topics.body: This happened when I was like thirteen or fourteen. Anyway, me and ma were just sitting on the couch. Just watching tv. And for whatever reason I look at her and say "I think I might just become really racist towards Italians." So she looks back at me with the biggest grin ever and says "But you're one quarter Italian." I just sit there dumbfounded and the first words out of my mouth were "Well shit. There goes that idea."
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff
